hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
rm -rf *.tap
echo "1..9" > results_$BUILD_ID.tap
echo "ok 1 This is test 1" >> results_$BUILD_ID.tap echo "ok 2 This is test 2" >> results_$BUILD_ID.tap echo "ok 3 This is test 3 # skip this test" >> results_$BUILD_ID.tap echo "ok 4 This is test 4" >> results_$BUILD_ID.tap echo "ok 5 This is test 5" >> results_$BUILD_ID.tap echo "not ok 6 This is test 6 # Inline fail comment" >> results_$BUILD_ID.tap echo "# Failure comment" >> results_$BUILD_ID.tap echo "ok 7 This is test 7" >> results_$BUILD_ID.tap echo "ok 8 This is test 8" >> results_$BUILD_ID.tap echo "ok 9 This is test 9 # Pass inline comment" >> results_$BUILD_ID.tap
